languages.text: {n}Печально вздохнув, Авель тихо добавляет:{/n} "Могущество само определяет достойных его".
{n}With a sad sigh, Abel adds quietly,{/n} "Great power has its own answers to the question of who is worthy of it."
languages.original_text: {n}Печально вздохнув, Авель тихо добавляет:{/n} "Могущество само определяет достойных его".

traits.locale_text: {n}With a sad sigh, Abel adds quietly,{/n} "Great power has its own answers to the question of who is worthy of it."
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}悲しげなため息と共に、アベルは静かにつけ加える。{/n}「大いなる力は、それを持つべきものは誰かを自ら選んできた」
languages.original_text: {n}With a sad sigh, Abel adds quietly,{/n} "Great power has its own answers to the question of who is worthy of it."

traits.locale_text: {n}悲しげなため息と共に、アベルは静かにつけ加える。{/n}「大いなる力は、それを持つべきものは誰かを自ら選んできた」
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}亚伯悲伤地叹了口气，平静地补充道。{/n}“至于谁配得上这伟大的力量，力量本身有它自己的答案。”
languages.original_text: {n}With a sad sigh, Abel adds quietly,{/n} "Great power has its own answers to the question of who is worthy of it."

traits.locale_text: {n}亚伯悲伤地叹了口气，平静地补充道。{/n}“至于谁配得上这伟大的力量，力量本身有它自己的答案。”
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Avec un soupir résigné, Abel murmure :{/n} « Un grand pouvoir est capable de déterminer lui-même qui est digne de le manier. »
languages.original_text: {n}With a sad sigh, Abel adds quietly,{/n} "Great power has its own answers to the question of who is worthy of it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Avec un soupir résigné, Abel murmure :{/n} « Un grand pouvoir est capable de déterminer lui-même qui est digne de le manier. »
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Tras un suspiro de tristeza, Abel añade en voz baja:{/n} «Solo el uso de un gran poder revela quién es merecedor de él».
languages.original_text: {n}With a sad sigh, Abel adds quietly,{/n} "Great power has its own answers to the question of who is worthy of it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tras un suspiro de tristeza, Abel añade en voz baja:{/n} «Solo el uso de un gran poder revela quién es merecedor de él».
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Mit einem traurigen Seufzen fügt Abel leise hinzu:{/n} "Große Macht hat ihre eigenen Antworten auf die Frage, wer ihrer würdig ist."
languages.original_text: {n}With a sad sigh, Abel adds quietly,{/n} "Great power has its own answers to the question of who is worthy of it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit einem traurigen Seufzen fügt Abel leise hinzu:{/n} "Große Macht hat ihre eigenen Antworten auf die Frage, wer ihrer würdig ist."
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abel, hüzünlü bir şekilde iç çekip kısık sesle ekliyor.{/n} "Büyük gücün, ona kimin layık olduğu sorusuna kendi yanıtları vardır."
languages.original_text: {n}With a sad sigh, Abel adds quietly,{/n} "Great power has its own answers to the question of who is worthy of it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel hüzünlü bir şekilde iç çekiyor ve kısık sesle ekliyor:{/n} "Büyük gücün, ona kimin layık olduğu sorusuna kendi yanıtları vardır."
traits.speaker: AvelSaved
